column4: has anyone here ever edited the xorg.conf file to allow connection to external output?
EdinNY: I'm not quite sure what you mean?
try  "/join #ltsp".  they use this in their project
I assume you want to view an X application run locally on a remote machine
EdinNY: errmm. What I want to do is connect my TV to my laptop to view films etc etc
do you have a card with a television output?
I was hoping to use the VGA slot ??
you need a vid card in that slot that supports TV out
VGA slot works on (dare I mention it) Windblows so it should also work on Ubuntu ???
you need a video card that has televsion out
no not straight off, so I assumed that there was a bit of tweaking required??
you need drivers that support it...I don't know if there are linux drivers that do...google your card model and linux
